page.title: 16SECONDARY SCHL,NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: In this area, where education is highly valued by the residents, the local comprehensive schools have high standards, active and enthusiastic staff and are usually closely watched by parents. There are very active parent-teacher associations, and many extra-curricular activities. The parents are able to help the schools to buy extra educational equipment of a major nature, for example minibuses, scientific apparatus, sports equipment etc. Pupils leaving secondary schools in this area will have an above-average number of pases at 'O' grade and 'H' grade and do not have as much difficulty in obtaining training or jobs as those in some other areas.
